LibBlockly.JavascriptPreview.Title: Javascript preview
LibBlockly.Settings.Collapse.Title: Allow collapsed blocks ?
LibBlockly.Settings.Collapse.Description: Allows blocks to be collapsed or expanded.
LibBlockly.Settings.Comments.Title: Allow comments on blocks ?
LibBlockly.Settings.Disable.Title: Allow disabled blocks ?
LibBlockly.Settings.Trashcan.Title: Show trashcan ?
LibBlockly.Settings.Trashcan.Description: Displays or hides the trashcan. Defaults to checked if the toolbox has categories, false otherwise.
LibBlockly.Settings.HorizontalLayout.Des: If checked toolbox is horizontal, if unchecked toolbox is vertical. Defaults to unchecked.
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.ShowControls.De: Check to show zoom-centre, zoom-in, and zoom-out buttons. Defaults to unchecked.
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.Wheel.Title: Allow mouse wheel to zoom ?
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.Wheel.Descripti: Check to allow the mouse wheel to zoom. Defaults to unchecked.
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.MaxScale.Title: Zoom Max Scale
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.MaxScale.Descri: Maximum multiplication factor for how far one can zoom in. Defaults to 3.
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.MinScale.Title: Zoom Min Scale
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.MinScale.Descri: Minimum multiplication factor for how far one can zoom out. Defaults to 0.3.
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.ScaleSpeed.Desc: For each zooming in-out step the scale is multiplied or divided respectively by the scale speed, this means that: scale = scaleSpeed ^ steps. Defaults to 1.2.
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.Pinch.Title: Allow pinch ?
LibBlockly.Settings.Zoom.Pinch.Descripti: Check to enable pinch to zoom support on touch devices. Defaults to checked if either the wheel or controls option is checked.
